thread.title: Uber Driver Learns Boyfriend Is Cheating When She Takes Another Woman To His House
thread.title_full: Uber Driver Learns Boyfriend Is Cheating When She Takes Another Woman To His House

author: Veronica Wells
title: Uber Driver Learns Boyfriend Is Cheating When She Takes Another Woman To His House
text:
You know what they say, what’s done in the dark will always come to the light. And this woman’s philandering boyfriend learned that the hard way when her girlfriend, who worked as an Uber driver dropped “the other woman” off at his front door. She recapped the story on Twitter and it made for quite the discussion.
[ View the story “#UberBae” on Storify ] The post Uber Driver Learns Boyfriend Is Cheating When She Takes Another Woman To His House appeared first on MadameNoire .
